title: Refine pre-meditation and meditation page UI controls

requirements.summary: Reduce the height of the Begin Meditation and Save Ritual buttons on the pre-meditation page to be appropriately sized when stacked in single column layout
acceptanceCriteria: Button heights are visibly smaller than current implementation
Proportions remain consistent when buttons wrap to single column
Buttons maintain readability and touch-friendly sizing

file_operations.description: Reduce the height of the 'Begin Meditation' and 'Save Ritual' buttons by adjusting their padding classes from py-4 to py-3 or py-2.5. Ensure both buttons have consistent heights and maintain appropriate spacing in single-column responsive layout.

requirements.summary: Add a dynamic title to the meditation guide container on the pre-meditation page that corresponds to the selected meditation type
acceptanceCriteria: Title displays above or within the meditation guide container
Title text matches the selected meditation type
Title updates dynamically when meditation type changes

file_operations.description: Add a dynamic title (e.g., 'Mindfulness Guide', 'Metta Guide', 'Visualization Guide', 'IFS Guide') above or within the meditation guide container. The title should be derived from the selectedMeditationType state and displayed with appropriate typography styling. Position it above the MeditationGuideStepper component while keeping the 'More Details' button centered at the bottom.

requirements.summary: Add a semi-transparent background to the play/pause button on the meditation page using the app's main theme color, and implement a subtle hover glow effect
acceptanceCriteria: Play/pause button has a visible semi-transparent background
Background color matches the app's primary theme color
Hover state shows a subtle glow effect
Button remains easily visible and accessible

file_operations.description: Add a semi-transparent background to the play/pause button using the app's accent-cyan color (or primary theme color) with appropriate opacity (e.g., bg-accent-cyan/20 or bg-primary/20). Implement a hover glow effect using shadow classes or custom CSS (e.g., hover:shadow-glow hover:shadow-accent-cyan/50). Ensure the button styling integrates with the existing theme system.

requirements.summary: Reduce the height of the time control and volume control input containers on the meditation page to make them more compact
acceptanceCriteria: Control containers have visibly reduced height

file_operations.description: Reduce the height of the containers that hold the time control slider and volume control slider by adjusting their padding classes (reduce py-* values or min-h-* classes). Ensure both containers have consistent reduced heights while maintaining usability and touch-friendly dimensions.

requirements.summary: Fix the time control slider on the meditation page so it responds correctly: dragging left decreases time and dragging right increases time
acceptanceCriteria: Dragging slider handle left decreases the time value
Dragging slider handle right increases the time value
Visual indicator moves in the same direction as user drag

file_operations.description: Fix the time control slider logic so that dragging left decreases the time value and dragging right increases it. Check if the slider component or its value binding is inverting the direction. Ensure the visual indicator and the actual time value change in sync with the user's drag direction.
